content.subject: Paid Collab with {{ params.brandName }} ü§ù
content.text:
Hey {{ params.influencerAccountName }},

{{ params.marketingManagerName }} here from {{ params.brandName }}. I watched your "{{ params.recentVideoTitle }}" video, and love your content style!! ü§©

Ever thought about introducing your fans to {{ params.productName }}? I've got a feeling it's right up their alley. 

{{  params.productDescription }} is available for just ${{ params.productPrice }}! You can check it out here {{ params.productLink }}

We‚Äôre looking to partner with 8 or so influencers in the {{ params.influencerNiche }} space to get the word out about the {{ params.productName }} over the next couple weeks, and would love for you to be apart of it!

We‚Äôd send you a free sample to make some content about and share with your audience, fully compensated of course.

Let me know what you think! 

Best,  

{{ params.marketingManagerName }}

content.subject: Quick Nudge on {{ params.brandName }} Collab ü§î
content.text:
Hey {{ params.influencerAccountName }},

Just floating this to the top of your inbox üéà

Hope you had a chance to think about our {{  params.productName }} collab. Still think we‚Äôd make a great team!

Would love to hear your thoughts!

Cheers,

{{ params.marketingManagerName }}

content.subject: Keen on {{ params.productName }}? üöÄ
content.text:
Hi {{ params.influencerAccountName }},

{{ params.marketingManagerName }} here again. Just wanted to check in again and see if you‚Äôd had time to consider our {{ params.productName }} collab.

 We're pretty excited about the potential here, but we‚Äôve only got a couple spots still open for collabs in the {{ params.influencerNiche }} space.

Give me a shout!

Best,
{{ params.marketingManagerName }}

content.subject: Last Call on Our Collab Idea üï∞Ô∏è

Subject: Last Call on Our Collab Idea üï∞Ô∏è

Hey {{ params.influencerAccountName }},
